TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SinkProviderData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Stores sink provider data for sink providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The sink provider data is a tree structure of configuration information stored in the [\<provider> Element (Template)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d3e67e16-8ca3-4b7f-b7a4-37e3e1a66364) configuration nodes. All sink providers must have a constructor that accepts a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties and a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of these structures if they want to be used from a configuration file.
## Examples [!code-vb[SinkProviderData#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.runtime.remotin_26_1.vb)] [!code-cs[SinkProviderData#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.runtime.remotin_26_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets a dictionary through which properties on the sink provider can be accessed.
